meanings.sent1: The cleaning solution was ammoniated to make it more effective.
meanings.sent2: The strong smell indicated that the solution was ammoniated.
meanings.sent3: The flowers seemed to enjoy the fresh, ammoniated air in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an ammoniated breeze, cutting through the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the solution made it clear that it was ammoniated.

meanings.sent1: The pungent odor of the cleaning product was unmistakably ammoniated.
meanings.sent2: The liquid had an ammoniated scent that lingered in the air.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the ammoniated sauce, creating a comical smell in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The air in the barn was so thick, it felt like an invisible cloud of ammoniated gas.
meanings.sent5: The old books emitted an unmistakable, slightly sweet, and ammoniated smell.
